data.title: SHIMADZU CORPORATION
data.meta_description: Since 1875, Shimadzu is pursuing leading-edge science and technologies in analytical and measuring instruments including chromatographs and mass spectrometers, medical devices, aeronautics, and industrial equipment.
data.text:
Analytical and Measuring Instruments

Shimadzu offers various analytical and measuring instruments to meet the demands of your high-throughput research.

More detail

Medical Systems

Shimadzu diagnostic imaging systems contribute to the early detection and treatment of diseases.

More detail

Vacuum and Industrial Machinery / Marine Devices

Shimadzu provides a variety of industrial and testing equipment for the advancement of industrial fields such as semiconductors.

More detail

Hydraulic Equipment

As a key component of machinery and vehicles, Shimadzu's hydraulic equipment contributes to the development of industry.

More detail

Aircraft Equipment

Shimadzu contributes to the safe and comfortable flight, and efficient marine development.

More detail

Optical Devices

Shimadzu offers optical devices such as diffraction gratings and aspherical mirrors to support improvements of equipment performance.

More detail

The "Stories of Excellence" introduces many ways and stories that illustrate how Shimadzu people, technologies, products and services, strive to improve society and well-being.

This website highlights Shimadzu's focus to advance collaborations on research & development for unique healthcare applications.

SHIMADZU TODAY features our latest corporate topics, news and stories. SHIMADZU proceeds various activities for society day after day.

This website introduces the efforts and technologies for virus detection, pneumonia diagnosis and drug analysis that Shimadzu can offer in responding to this pandemic.
